When making a verb for an item is it possible if using more than one word to put the item word in the middle or beginning. Like if you have an item "ladder" and you want the person to say "put ladder down". (This is the best example i could think of on the spot) The verbs always put the object at the end like Climb "ladder" or put down "ladder" But if you wanted put "ladder" down. How do you put the object in the middle of a phrase?

Also if anyon has any help or ideas for my use item post "problems" below this post it would be great.

Posts.EditableText: If you want full control, use a command instead of a verb. See chapter 11 of the tutorial (page 30) - you want a command like "put #@object# down" (or you can just directly create a "put ladder down" command).
